root.name: Crisis Heart Brawlers: Clash at Otakon
root.description: Crisis Heart Brawlers: Clash at Otakon is a KickStarter funded video game created in cooperation with Otakon, a Baltimore based annual anime convention. The game is being produced to commemorate the convention's 20th anniversary. The game isbeing produced by veterans and regulars of the US anime industry, web comics industry and regulars of the US anime convention circuit.

similar_games.game: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Turtles in Time Re-Shelled
